channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-19581] view do not support unicode characters well
item.description:
create table t_test (name ,string) ;
insert into table t_test VALUES ('李四');
create view t_view_test as select * from t_test where name='李四';

when select  * from t_view_test   no  records return
item.summary: view do not support unicode characters well

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: This works on master. I am adding a test to avoid future regressions, especially as our unicode coverage seems limited.

+1 overall

asherman The change looks good to me. Just a minor suggestion. Would it be better to define a table with 2 columns and do a select on the one column, instead of select * while the filter uses specifies column? Might be a bit more complete.
I am good with what we have currently as well.
OK thanks ngangam I have attached a new patch
Thanks asherman Patch looks good to me. +1 pending test results.

asherman Fix has been pushed master. Thank you for your contribution.
Should the fix + test addition be committed to branch-3 as well? I ran this test against branch-3 and the test failed. If you think we should push this to branch-3 as well, could you please attach a new patch for branch-3 (name it so to make it obvious that it is for branch-3)? If not, I think we can close out this jira. Thanks again
